title: Rollback executor
description: Rollback applied migrations from SurrealDB with dependency safety checks

module.description: Target specific module by name (e.g., 'auth'), number (e.g., 10), full directory name (e.g., '010_auth'), or comma-separated list (e.g., '010,020,auth')

filename.description: Target specific rollback file by number (e.g., 1), name (e.g., 'auth'), full filename (e.g., '0001_authentication_down.surql'), or comma-separated list (e.g., '1,2,auth')

envFile.description: Path to environment file relative to workspace root

force.description: Force rollback even if safety checks fail (bypass dependency validation)

configPath.description: Path to configuration file (config.json or config.yaml)

dryRun.description: Show what rollbacks would be applied without executing them

steps.description: Number of migration steps to rollback (default: 1, use 0 for all)

detailed.description: Show detailed rollback information including execution details
